page.title: 17MR. SANTI'S FISH AND CHIPS
page.content: Fish and chips have been a popular food in England for many years.We spent time with the owner of our local shop,Mr.Santi,to find out what it was like to run a local business. Mr.Santi has been running his shop for over 10 years and he works very hard. He employs two people to serve,and does all the cooking himself.He went into business after seeing how well his friend had succeeded.He opens 6 days a week,at lunch and in the evening.He has got a reasonable choice of food ranging from chips(30p per portion),to fish(53p)and chicken(80p). Mr.Santi is supplied with his potatoes from Liverpool Fruit and Veg. Market and uses mainly local potatoes.Much of his fish comes from Scotland and is Cod.He rents his shop from the council but it needs repairs to a leaking roof. {(S.Cloy/J.Langton)
